info.headline: Fire Warning issued March 19 at 12:35AM CDT by NWS Amarillo TX
info.description:
FRWAMA
THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE IN AMARILLO HAS ISSUED A FIRE WARNING AT THE REQUEST OF BORGER EMERGENCY MANAGER FOR SOUTH CENTRAL HUTCHINSON COUNTY.
* AT 1234 AM CDT...A DANGEROUS WILDFIRE WAS LOCATED OVER WESTERN BORGER NORTH OF HIGHWAY 136...MOVING AT 3 TO 5 MPH.
* AREAS IMPACTED...AREAS OF WESTERN BORGER NORTH OF 3RD STREET, INCLUDING THE ROCK CREEK, GATEWAY, AND GOLF COURSE ADDITIONS. WINDS ARE EXPECTED TO SHIFT OUT OF THE NORTHWEST BETWEEN 1 TO 2 AM WITH A COLD FRONT, WHICH MAY LEAD TO FIRE SPREAD EFFECTING AREAS FURTHER SOUTH AND EAST IN BORGER.
* ADDITIONAL INFORMATION...SMOKE AND FIRE WILL PRESENT A THREAT TO LIFE AND PROPERTY FOR RESIDENTIAL AREAS OF WESTERN BORGER. BE PREPARED TO TAKE ACTION IF FIRE SPREAD CHANGES DIRECTIONS AND THREATENS NEW AREAS. TEMPORARY REFUGE IS LOCATED AT THE CITY OF BORGER MUNICIPAL COURT AT 611 WEATHERLY STREET. MOST OF THE TOWN IS WITHOUT POWER.
info.instruction: BE PREPARED TO EVACUATE QUICKLY IF REQUESTED AND FOLLOW ALL SAFETY INSTRUCTIONS FROM LOCAL EMERGENCY MANAGEMENT OFFICIALS. DO NOT DRIVE INTO SMOKE.
